src:
Reece James, Pencetak Gol Termuda Chelsea di Liga Champions
06 Nov 2019, 09:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Satu demi satu pemain muda Chelsea menunjukkan kelasnya di tim utama. Setelah Tammy Abraham, Fikayo Tomori dan Mason Mount, kini giliran Reece James yang membuat fans Chelsea berdecak kagum.
Reece James tidak tampil sebagai pemain inti di laga Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam pada matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Reece James baru dimainkan pada babak kedua.
Manajer Chelsea, Frank Lampard, memainkan Reece James untuk menggantikan Marcos Alonso pada menit ke-46. Saat itu, Chelsea dalam posisi tertinggal 1-3 dari Ajax. Lini pertahanan Chelsea keropos pada babak pertama.
Masuknya Reece James membuat barisan pertahanan Chelsea jauh lebih baik di babak kedua. Chelsea hanya kebobolan satu gol tambahan. Bukan hanya kuat saat bertahan, Reece James juga tajam ketika membantu serangan.
text:
Reece James, Chelsea's youngest goalscorer in the Champions League
Nov 6 2019, 09:19 by Bola.net
Chelsea - One by one young Chelsea players show their class in the first team. After Tammy Abraham, Fikayo Tomori and Mason Mount, now it's Reece James's turn to make Chelsea fans amazed.
Reece James did not appear as a core player in the match Chelsea vs Ajax Amsterdam on the fourth matchday of the Champions League group phase on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. Reece James was only played in the second round.
Chelsea manager Frank Lampard plays Reece James to replace Marcos Alonso in the 46th minute. At that time, Chelsea were 1-3 behind in Ajax. Chelsea's defense lines porous in the first round.
Reece James's entry made Chelsea's defense much better in the second half. Chelsea only conceded one additional goal. Not only strong when defending, Reece James is also sharp when helping attacks.
